remarks: The value of F. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Nov-2016.)
statement:
ballotth.m $e |- M e. NN $.
ballotth.n $e |- N e. NN $.
ballotth.o $e |- O = { c e. ~P ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) | ( # ` c ) = M } $.
ballotth.p $e |- P = ( x e. ~P O |-> ( ( # ` x ) / ( # ` O ) ) ) $.
ballotth.f $e |- F = ( c e. O |-> ( i e. ZZ |-> ( ( # ` ( ( 1 ... i ) i^i c ) ) - ( # ` ( ( 1 ... i ) \ c ) ) ) ) ) $.
ballotlemfval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. O ) $.
ballotlemfval.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ZZ ) $.
ballotlemfval $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F ` C ) ` J ) = ( ( # ` ( ( 1 ... J ) i^i C ) ) - ( # ` ( ( 1 ... J ) \ C ) ) ) ) $.
$d C i $.
$d F c i $.
$d J i $.
$d M c i $.
$d N c i $.
$d O c i $.
$d i ph $.
